title: My Daughter's Too Introverted for a Big College
description:
Patty worries that her daughter is too young and introverted to go to a large college far from home. - Dr. Laura: "Let your daughter go so she can put the things you've taught her to use."

Are you ready to let your kids grow up and move on from you? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
